name: Sangen Kaimen
text:
If this card was activated outside the Battle Phase, apply 1 of these effects. If it was activated during the Battle Phase, you can apply any of them, in sequence.
● Add 1 Level 4 or lower FIRE Dragon monster from your Deck to your hand.
● Special Summon 1 FIRE Dragon monster from your hand.
You can only activate 1 "Sangen Kaimen" per turn.
